name: segment-ack-pdu
description: Represents a BACnet SegmentACK PDU, used to acknowledge receipt of segmented messages.

fields.name: pdu-type
fields.description: The type of the protocol data unit (PDU).

fields.name: negative-ack
fields.description: Indicates if this is a negative acknowledgment.

fields.name: server
fields.description: Indicates if the message is from the server.

fields.name: original-invoke-id
fields.description: The invoke ID of the original segmented message.

fields.name: sequence-number
fields.description: The sequence number of the segment being acknowledged.

fields.name: actual-window-size
fields.description: The actual window size used for segmentation.
